staking.unstakeDescription: The pledged principal will be released linearly according to the block. Users can withdraw the unlocked portion at any time, while continuing to enjoy the increased returns on the remaining principal.
staking.unstakeInfo: You may unstake the released staking amount at any time. If remaining staked, these funds will continue to generate block rewards.
staking.claimDescription: Claim your staking rewards and rebase boost. Rewards will be sent directly to your wallet address.
staking.recordsDescription: You can view your staking records here.
staking.noRecords: This address has no staked tokens. You can now stake and earn daily rewards.
staking.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet or enter a wallet address to view the detailed statistics
staking.calculatorDescription: You can simulate and calculate the income you get from long-term staking.

lockedStaking.title: Locked Staking
lockedStaking.alertDescription: Long-term staking incentivizes users to extend the staking period through block rewards, and the incentive amount is directly proportional to the staking duration.
lockedStaking.unstakeDescription: The pledged principal will be released linearly according to the block. Users can withdraw the unlocked portion at any time, while continuing to enjoy the increased returns on the remaining principal.
lockedStaking.unstakeInfo: You may unstake the released staking amount at any time. If remaining staked, these funds will continue to generate block rewards.
lockedStaking.calculatorDescription: You can simulate and calculate the income you get from long-term staking.
lockedStaking.claimInfo: You may claim rebase rewards at any time. If unclaimed, these rewards will automatically compound and continue to generate additional rebase rewards.

dao.matrix_bonus_description: The matrix mechanism links up and down, automatically deducting up to ten generations of Rebase income daily
dao.evangelist_bonus_description: Once you become a V-level member, as long as there are V-level members in your evangelist network, you can permanently receive a 2% commission on their evangelist rewards, up to 10 levels deep.
dao.super_bonus_description: In the OLY ONE evangelism network, as long as the structural memory is a V-level member, you will receive a 2% commission on their evangelism rewards, penetrating up to 10 layers, permanently effective.
dao.referral_bonus_description: Invite friends to participate in purchasing bonds or staking for 180 or 360 days, and you can receive a 5% commission reward.
dao.max_bonus_info: The maximum bonus you can receive is 6 times your personal holding amount. Increasing your personal holding can increase the upper limit of the total bonus you can receive. Currently <highlight>{rate}</highlight>.
dao.max_bonus_info_max: Your bonus has reached the maximum claim amount. Increasing your personal holdings can increase the upper limit of the total bonus you can receive.
dao.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet or enter a wallet address to view the detailed statistics
dao.noRecords: This address has no evangelist bonus-related transaction records.
dao.superNoRecords: This address has no super bonus-related transaction records.
dao.referralNoRecords: This address has no referral bonus-related transaction records.

noLockedStaking.title: No-Lock Staking
noLockedStaking.alertDescription: You can deposit or withdraw staking at any time, with no lock-in period, and block rewards are distributed every 12 hours
noLockedStaking.unstakeDescription: You can unstake at any time, partially or fully withdraw your staking shares
noLockedStaking.unstakeInfo: After completing staking, your assets will enter a 24-hour cooling period. After the cooling time ends, funds can be released.
noLockedStaking.unstakeDisabledInfo: Before unstaking, you need to release this asset first.\nThe system will automatically release unfrozen assets when you initiate new staking.\nPlease note that only after successfully releasing this asset can you claim the block rewards generated by this asset.
noLockedStaking.calculatorDescription: You can simulate and calculate the income you get from flexible staking.
noLockedStaking.claimInfo: You can claim accumulated rewards at any time. After claiming, rewards will be sent to your wallet immediately.

swap.title: Swap
swap.alertDescription: Search for the best price, including gas costs and swap fees. Execute with one click.
swap.searchBestPrice: Search for the best price, including gas costs and swap fees. Execute with one click.

turbine.title: Turbine
turbine.alertDescription: Turbine Pool is a yield acceleration and management platform built on smart contracts, an important component of the OLY DAO ecosystem. Assets from the release pool are transferred to the Turbine Pool for secondary value empowerment, and users can claim yields through decentralized exchange (Swap) transactions. It adopts an innovative liquidity conversion mechanism, using AMM algorithms to ensure fairness and efficiency, optimizing yield claiming and increasing liquidity depth.
turbine.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet or enter a wallet address to view the detailed statistics
turbine.noRecords: This address has no turbine-related transaction records.

community.title: Community
community.selectFeature: Please use the right navigation bar to select specific community features
community.protocolDescription: OLY ONE is a future-oriented decentralized finance (DeFi 3.0) protocol, jointly initiated, collaboratively built, and governed by communities from multiple countries, aiming to create a sustainable, transparent, and highly secure DeFi ecosystem, promoting the value consensus of truly decentralized finance among global users. Don't miss out!

step1.title: 1 Deposit Assets
step1.description: Stake OLY on the platform, or use USDT to purchase bonds, to start earning basic income. A minimum of $100 share is required to start.

step2.title: 2 Refer Friends
step2.description: Invite friends to register and complete staking through your invitation link, and both you and your friends can receive additional rewards.

step3.title: 3 Create Community
step3.description: Create your own staking community, attract more members to join, or join a highly active community. The platform will distribute additional rewards based on the total locked amount of the community.

community.referralDescription: Please enter the referral address to confirm that they can receive appropriate rewards.
community.inviteFriends: Invite friends, enjoy 5 major income systems
community.referralBenefits: Successfully inviting friends to participate can unlock direct commissions, ten-level matrix income, community evangelist rewards, global dividend rights, and cross-level penetration rewards, accumulating multiple benefits for continuous passive income!
community.notData: There are no recommended records for this address

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.analytics_description: Through visual charts, deeply analyze data trends, turning complex data into clear decision-making basis.

coolingPool.title: Cooling Pool
coolingPool.description: The Cooling Pool is a yield management system built on smart contracts within the OLY ONE ecosystem, responsible for the orderly release of yields generated by users through staking, bonds, and other incentive activities. All yields, once claimed, enter the Cooling Pool and are linearly released in blocks according to the user's self-set release period. The system will implement a tiered tax policy based on the release period. This mechanism ensures the flexibility of user assets while effectively maintaining market stability and avoiding short-term liquidity shocks.
coolingPool.rewardsInPool: Amount of rewards in the cooling pool
coolingPool.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet or enter a wallet address to view the detailed statistics
coolingPool.noRecords: This address has no cooling pool-related transaction records.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Through dynamic multi-dimensional data visualization, track key metrics in real-time—including asset allocation, community analytics, performance growth, and reward details—all in one intuitive interface.
